page.title: 04TRADE
page.content: Shopping in Witheridge is fun.The shops can offer most of what we need without having to go to the towns.We have our own small supermarket which has a good butchery as well.There is old established bakers which provide a wide variety of bread and cakes,enough to serve the area.We also have a dairy which delivers milk to a large area as well as two other general stores selling groceries , vegetables and hardware items.The local newspaper shop sells a wide range of medical supplies as well as selling shoes and Witheridge also has it's own sub-post office.A new venture has been a clothes shop with a D.I.Y department. To complete the facilities we also have a bank branch,the local garage sells a wide range of motoring accessories and there is an electrical shop selling T.V's and radios.
